name: premature
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening or done too soon, especially before the natural or suitable time: premature birth/death a premature baby Their criticisms seem premature considering that the results aren't yet known.

happening or done too soon, esp. before the natural or desired time: a premature death at age 50 A spokesman said it was premature to comment on the negotiations.
